attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Before Labour was elected in the Tory party almost destroyed the UK. They are the new Nazi party!!! No one can see it because we have been brain-washed by Camron and the media to think that Labour is to blame for the credit crunch, but it is actually the world banks fault!!! If they are elected again, they will destroy half of the country and put us further in this credit crunch!!! So make them illegal!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
